title: Complaint Extraction & Classification - Generic Prompt
author: Raveena Khan, Sriparna Banerjee
description:
Complaint Extraction & Classification:
This is a generic prompt adaptable with any LLM that extracts complaints from the summary generated by the Summary prompt and classifies the complaints based on the categories provided in the prompt. The prompt is written in ReAct style with examples for few shot learning which has proven to provide both classification accuracy and F-score to be above 90%.
